sentence.Network_en: Have the thing of legume more, food, be like the simplest soyamilk. Soya bean ah etc.
sentence.Network_cn: 多吃豆类的东西, 食品, 就如最简单的豆浆. 黄豆啊等等.

sentence.Network_en: Based on the principle of chemical reaction , distinguishing method of milk adulterated soyamilk was improved.
sentence.Network_cn: 牛乳中掺入豆浆, 从感观和理化指标上很难鉴别,故掺入现象较为普遍.

PerfectNetExp.abs: soyama 曾山, soyamilk 大豆汁, soyama 祖山

list.abs: Can honey mix soyamilk to drink ?, 蜂蜜可以混豆浆喝吗?
